title: Prompt engineering
subtitle: Learning efficient communicate with AI
descriptions: Enhance and refine prompts for diverse uses of language models. Understand their potential and limits. Gain insight into their strengths and limits. Use AI to boost programming, streamline management, and draft documents efficiently.

title: Code in feminine
subtitle: Talk about women in IT
descriptions: This conference explores the historical and current contributions of women in computing, highlights the challenges posed by gender stereotypes, and examines ongoing efforts to promote greater diversity and inclusion in the tech field.
technologies: Want to see the slides?

title: Raqyx
subtitle: Video game for iOS and Android
descriptions: Players navigate a dynamic space, strategically creating territories while avoiding ennemies. The game features immersive visuals, progressive levels, and an engaging 8-bit soundtrack, offering a unique and enjoyable gaming adventure.
